New Records: Richard Fitts made his MLB debut and pitched well in his first appearance
Key Match Events: The game was tied 2-2 going into the ninth inning
Zack Kelly allowed five runs in the top of the ninth inning
Chicago White Sox scored six runs in the ninth inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Red Sox needed to win to gain ground in the playoff race
Manager Alex Cora emphasized the importance of the game
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Alex Cora expressed frustration with the loss
The Red Sox squandered a chance to move closer to the playoffs
Miscellaneous Highlights: Richard Fitts picked off Luis Robert Jr. in the first inning
The Red Sox had baserunning mishaps in the first inning
Luis Guerrero also made his MLB debut in the ninth inning
